translation.en: [man on radio] And now the news from Europe.
translation.zh: 接下来是来自欧洲的新闻

translation.en: With British forces withdrawn from the continent,
translation.zh: 由于英军从大陆的撤离

translation.en: the Nazis presently command the English Channel, the Atlantic coast,
translation.zh: 纳粹目前已完全掌控了英吉利海峡 大西洋海岸及法国北部

translation.en: and the north of France,
translation.zh: 大西洋海岸及法国北部

translation.en: forcing multitudes to flee Paris for the unoccupied zone in the south.
translation.zh: 迫使大批人员逃离巴黎前往南方未被侵占之地

translation.en: [man] The last free port of Marseille teems with refugees from all over Europe,
translation.zh: 马赛的最后一个自由港挤满了来自欧洲各地的难民

translation.en: desperately seeking travel visas and funds to depart for the new world.
translation.zh: 他们正不顾一切地寻求着前往新世界的签证与旅费

translation.en: This came for you today in my diplomatic pouch.
translation.zh: 我的外交邮袋里今天有个寄给你的东西

translation.en: Go ahead. It won't bite.
translation.zh: 拿去吧 又不会咬人

translation.en: My father is demanding that I come home to Chicago.
translation.zh: 我父亲强烈要求我回芝加哥去

translation.en: He's bought me a ticket for tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 连明晚的机票都帮我买好了

translation.en: He has been asking nicely ever since the Nazis marched into Paris.
translation.zh: 不过他从三个月前纳粹攻入巴黎后就一直在好言相劝来着

translation.en: He's done being nice. He's threatening to cut me off.
translation.zh: 看来他的好言已尽他威胁要断了我的经济来源

translation.en: Can you blame him? His only daughter gallivanting around wartime Marseille
translation.zh: 你能怪他吗？ 他的独生女儿在战时的马赛与希特勒的头号通缉犯一起玩乐

translation.en: with Hitler's most wanted?
translation.zh: 他的独生女儿在战时的马赛与希特勒的头号通缉犯一起玩乐

translation.en: I'm trying to save their lives.
translation.zh: 我这是在努力救人性命

translation.en: Come on, Ms. Gold. Be good. Go home. Settle down with a nice guy.
translation.zh: 好啦 戈尔德小姐 乖一点 回家去 找个好男人安顿下来就像其他人那样

translation.en: -Well, I don't see you rushing home. -I'm here for work.
translation.zh: 也没见你着急着回家呀 我在这里有工作要做啊

translation.en: And so am I.
translation.zh: 我也是啊

translation.en: These are some of Europe's finest minds, Mr. Patterson,
translation.zh: 这些可都是全欧洲最优秀的人才啊帕特森先生

translation.en: and America would be lucky to have them.
translation.zh: 美国要是能拥有他们简直是太幸运了

translation.en: -You know what makes America great? -Please remind me.
translation.zh: 你知道是什么使美国伟大吗戈尔德小姐？ 请您赐教

translation.en: The hammer. There's 50 different kinds of hammer in the United States.
translation.zh: 榔头 在美国有50种不同的榔头

translation.en: -Fifty. -What was wrong with the first one?
translation.zh: -你敢相信吗？整整50种-有必要发明这么多吗？

translation.en: Nothing. And they're already working on the 51st.
translation.zh: 完全没必要但他们已经在研究第51种了

translation.en: That's American ingenuity for you.
translation.zh: 这才是美国式的聪明才智

translation.en: These European intellectuals are just staring at their own navels.
translation.zh: 这帮欧洲的知识分子整天活在自己的世界中钻牛角尖

translation.en: Says you.
translation.zh: 那是你的看法

translation.en: [Patterson] Do you really wanna help that badly? Send money from Chicago.
translation.zh: 你真的这么想帮忙吗？那就从芝加哥多送点钱过来

translation.en: Will you please speak to my father for me?
translation.zh: 你能不能帮我跟父亲谈谈呀？

translation.en: He thinks you're a man with common sense.
translation.zh: 他认为你是个很有常识的人

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 或许吧

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, I have to powder my nose.
translation.zh: 失陪一下 我要去补个妆

translation.en: Here. Take it. The boy didn't even touch it.
translation.zh: 来 给你 那个男孩连碰也没碰

translation.en: Are you trying to get out of Marseille?
translation.zh: 你在想办法逃离马赛吗？

translation.en: Isn't everybody?
translation.zh: 大家不都在吗？

translation.en: We both got away from Paris.
translation.zh: 我俩都逃离了巴黎

translation.en: I can get you on the boat to New York tomorrow. The MS Rex.
translation.zh: 我能让你登上明天去纽约的船MS雷克斯号

translation.en: You can get visas?
translation.zh: 你有办法拿到签证？

translation.en: No, but if you go at 6:00 a.m.,
translation.zh: 没有 但如果你早上六点去

translation.en: they will be loading cargo in the back of the ship.
translation.zh: 会碰上他们在船尾装货

translation.en: You talk to Lionel, and he can get you on.
translation.zh: 你去找利昂内尔 他会帮你登船的

translation.en: As stowaways?
translation.zh: 要做偷渡客？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I'm traveling with my brother.
translation.zh: 我得带上我弟弟一起走

translation.en: Then I… I'll pay Lionel for both of you.
translation.zh: 那我就给利昂内尔你们两个人的钱

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: I have the money. I can do it. Does it matter why?
translation.zh: 因为我有钱 又有门路我是为什么有这么重要吗？

translation.en: Here. If you need to reach me, you can find me here.
translation.zh: 来 如果你需要联系我你可以来这里找我

translation.en: I'm working with the Emergency Rescue Committee
translation.zh: 我在紧急救援委员会工作

translation.en: at the Hotel Splendide.
translation.zh: 就在斯普莱迪德酒店里

translation.en: If you clean yourself up, you can go up on the deck once the ship sets sail,
translation.zh: 要是你梳妆打扮一番 等船起航后 你可以到甲板上去没人会注意到的

translation.en: and no one will notice.
translation.zh: 等船起航后 你可以到甲板上去没人会注意到的

translation.en: -Did you-- -Oh, I just fixed my hair.
translation.zh: -你是不是…-噢 我只是梳了个头发

translation.en: Do you like it?
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗？

translation.en: -[in French] Good morning. -Good morning.
translation.zh: -早上好-早上好

translation.en: -[In French] Good morning, Paul. -Mary Jayne.
translation.zh: -早上好 保罗-玛丽·珍

translation.en: [in French] Special delivery for Mademoiselle Gold!
translation.zh: 戈尔德小姐的特快专递

translation.en: [in English] Can you get this to Lionel? I have two more for the boat.
translation.zh: 你能在明早之前把这个交给利昂内尔吗？ 船上要再加两个人

translation.en: [Paul] No problem.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: Dagobert.
translation.zh: 达戈贝尔

translation.en: -[in French] Hello. -Hello.
translation.zh: -早上好-早上好

translation.en: -[man in English] Here's your lunch. -I thank you.
translation.zh: -您的午餐来了-谢谢你

translation.en: [man] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Varian Fry. -[knocking]
translation.zh: 瓦里安·弗莱

translation.en: -[in French] This way. -[Varian] Thanks.
translation.zh: -这边请-谢谢

translation.en: [in English] How goes your Rescue Committee?
translation.zh: 你的“美国救援委员会”怎么样啦？

translation.en: Emergency Rescue Committee.
translation.zh: -是“美国紧急救援委员会”-骑着闪亮战马的骑士…

translation.en: Knights on shining horses. Or is it shining knights on…
translation.zh: -是“美国紧急救援委员会”-骑着闪亮战马的骑士… 还是身着闪亮铠甲的…我总忘记怎么说

translation.en: I always forget.
translation.zh: 还是身着闪亮铠甲的…我总忘记怎么说

translation.en: I saw your Miss Gold today.
translation.zh: 我今天见到了你们的戈尔德小姐

translation.en: Miss Gold. She's indispensable to our operation.
translation.zh: 戈尔德小姐她是我们组织中不可或缺的一员

translation.en: A spoiled young lady with no clue about the real world.
translation.zh: 戈尔德小姐是位被宠坏的年轻女士她对真实世界一无所知

translation.en: Her daddy's money is indispensable. Let's hope he keeps it coming, hm?
translation.zh: 可她老爸的钱是不可或缺的希望金主的恩赐源源不断吧

translation.en: Mr. Patterson,
translation.zh: 帕特森先生

translation.en: why are you stonewalling Mr. Benjamin's visa request?
translation.zh: 您为何要百般阻挠本雅明先生的签证申请？

translation.en: This is a matter of life and death.
translation.zh: 现在是生死攸关的时刻啊

translation.en: It always is.
translation.zh: 向来如此

translation.en: People here have been killing since the Trojan War.
translation.zh: 自特洛伊战争时起这片大陆上的人们就在互相残杀了

translation.en: The Trojan War was fought for love. The Nazis are driven only by hate--
translation.zh: 特洛伊战争是为爱而战而纳粹的动力却只有仇恨

translation.en: You're a guest here, Mr. Fry.
translation.zh: 你在这里是客 弗莱先生

translation.en: The United States has a neutral position in this war. Don't forget that.
translation.zh: 美国在这场战争中选择了中立这点你可别忘了

translation.en: You and I are in wartime France at the pleasure of the French authorities.
translation.zh: 你与我之所以能留在战时的法国是看法国当局的眼色

translation.en: Most Americans wouldn't come here to begin with.
translation.zh: 大部分的美国人才不会愿意来呢

translation.en: My own wife refused to join me.
translation.zh: 连我自己的妻子都拒绝跟我一起来

translation.en: So,
translation.zh: 所以

translation.en: what are you really doing here, Mr. Fry?
translation.zh: 你来这里究竟要做什么 弗莱先生？

translation.en: You bored at home?
translation.zh: 在家里闲着无聊？

translation.en: Unhappy marriage?
translation.zh: 不幸的婚姻？

translation.en: Innocent people's lives are being ruined, Mr. Patterson.
translation.zh: 无辜之人的生活正在被毁掉帕特森先生

translation.en: They're being wrongfully incarcerated.
translation.zh: 他们正受到不公正的拘禁

translation.en: Even killed.
translation.zh: 甚至被杀害

translation.en: Last week, two more people on my list committed suicide.
translation.zh: 就在上周 我名单上又有两人自杀了

translation.en: These refugees need help, and no one else is lifting a finger.
translation.zh: 这些难民需要帮助 却没有人站出来做点什么

translation.en: I don't need a better reason.
translation.zh: 我不需要比这个更好的理由

translation.en: Well, as an American, I expect you to behave yourself in Marseille.
translation.zh: 作为一名美国人我希望你在马赛不要惹麻烦

translation.en: Do that for me, and I'll figure out Mr. Benjamin's visa.
translation.zh: 帮我忙做到这点的话本雅明先生签证的事 我会想办法的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Please leave the food outside. Thank you.
translation.zh: 请把食物放在外面 谢谢

translation.en: [Mary Jayne] Mr. Benjamin, it's me. Mary Jayne.
translation.zh: 本雅明先生 是我 玛丽·珍

translation.en: Now please release me from this purgatory.
translation.zh: 请你将我从这个炼狱中解放出去吧

translation.en: [Mary Jayne] The MS Rex is in the harbor, ready to take you to New York.
translation.zh: MS雷克斯号已经停在港口就等着载上你去纽约呢

translation.en: [Benjamin] What are you doing?
translation.zh: 拜托 你这是要干嘛啊？

translation.en: No, Mr. Benjamin, it smells like a hash den in here.
translation.zh: 不行 本雅明先生这里闻起来简直就是一个大麻窝

translation.en: If the French find me here, they'll send me to the prison camps,
translation.zh: 要是被法国人发现我在这儿他们会直接把我送回集中营去的

translation.en: and I can't go back there.
translation.zh: 我可不能回去

translation.en: [Mary Jayne] I understand.
translation.zh: 我理解

translation.en: I really do.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: My Berlin was a paradise. Now they've destroyed it.
translation.zh: 我的柏林原本是个天堂如今却被他们彻底毁掉了

translation.en: Please don't touch that.
translation.zh: 请不要碰这个

translation.en: It's the only thing that I have left from my past.
translation.zh: 这是我的过去给我留下的唯一东西了

translation.en: You know, you're lucky.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 你很幸运

translation.en: You can go back home.
translation.zh: 你可以回家了

translation.en: Well, I don't know about that. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 恐怕并非如此

translation.en: [man] Come.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: Come.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: [in German] Let's share my challah.
translation.zh: 来 我把哈拉分给你们吃

translation.en: Challah?
translation.zh: “哈拉”？

translation.en: [in German] I thought you were Jews, like everyone here.
translation.zh: 我还以为你们跟这里的大家一样都是犹太人呢

translation.en: We are.
translation.zh: 我们是

translation.en: We were. We just never really…
translation.zh: 曾经是 我们只是从未真正地…

translation.en: Our parents left all that behind.
translation.zh: 我们的父母早就不信教了

translation.en: Your parents left all that behind,
translation.zh: 虽然你们父母早就不信教了

translation.en: and yet they are still Jewish enough for Hitler?
translation.zh: 但对希特勒来说他们依旧是不折不扣的犹太人？

translation.en: Yes. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [woman] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [man] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [in German] My daughter is waiting in New York.
translation.zh: 我的女儿在纽约等着我

translation.en: She wanted me to leave Germany with her. That was two years ago.
translation.zh: 她本来想让我跟她一起离开德国的 那是两年前的事了

translation.en: Why didn't you leave?
translation.zh: 你为什么没离开？

translation.en: Stupidity.
translation.zh: 愚蠢

translation.en: Pride.
translation.zh: 傲慢

translation.en: Do you have the documents to be able to leave?
translation.zh: 你有离开所需要的证件吗？

translation.en: [man 1] No, not yet.
translation.zh: 不 还没有

translation.en: But I have unwavering faith and trust in God.
translation.zh: 但我对上帝有着坚定的信念与信任

translation.en: And…
translation.zh: 还有…

translation.en: hatmadah.
translation.zh: “哈斯莫得”

translation.en: Hatmadah?
translation.zh: “哈斯莫得”？

translation.en: [man 1] Perseverance.
translation.zh: 毅力

translation.en: If Abraham can survive the ten tests,
translation.zh: 如果说亚伯拉罕能经受住十次考验

translation.en: then we can survive this too.
translation.zh: 那我们就一定也能经受住

translation.en: -[in English] Hello. -Speak of the devil.
translation.zh: -你好呀-说曹操 曹操到

translation.en: Oh, gee, thanks.
translation.zh: 噢 天呐 谢谢哟

translation.en: [woman] Where's your dress?
translation.zh: 你的裙子呢？

translation.en: Seriously, what are you wearing?
translation.zh: 说真的 你穿的这是什么呀？

translation.en: -[Varian] Down to the beach again? -No.
translation.zh: -又跑去海滩玩了吗？-没有

translation.en: [Varian] Our job's difficult enough.
translation.zh: 我们的任务已经够艰巨了 玛丽·珍

translation.en: Just find the 200 people on the list approved by the State Department,
translation.zh: 把国务院批准名单上的那两百人找到

translation.en: get them out on boats to the US.
translation.zh: 然后让他们坐上去美国的船

translation.en: While the American government is hoarding all of the visas
translation.zh: 在美国政府压着所有签证不发的同时

translation.en: and we have how many people hiding out in this hotel?
translation.zh: 我们这家酒店里藏了有多少人来着？

translation.en: Poor Mr. Benjamin is on the verge of a nervous breakdown.
translation.zh: 你可知道可怜的本雅明先生都已经处于精神崩溃的边缘了

translation.en: I'm working on him.
translation.zh: 知道 我在处理他的事了

translation.en: The Museum of Modern Art is working on Ernst and Breton.
translation.zh: 现代艺术博物馆也已经在处理恩斯特和布勒东的事了

translation.en: You've been in Marseille for how long now, Varian?
translation.zh: 你来马赛已经多长时间了 瓦里安？

translation.en: What is it, two months?
translation.zh: 多久了？两个月？

translation.en: And in all that time,
translation.zh: 在这么长一段时间里

translation.en: how many people from the committee's famous list
translation.zh: 那张著名的委员会名单上究竟有多少人

translation.en: have you officially managed to rescue?
translation.zh: 被你正式救援成功了？

translation.en: -[Varian] Not enough. -Eleven people.
translation.zh: 不够多 11人 仅此而已

translation.en: Eleven people! That's it.
translation.zh: 11人 仅此而已

translation.en: Do you think I don't know that?
translation.zh: 你以为我不知道吗？

translation.en: I haven't managed one tenth of what I've set out to do.
translation.zh: 我连自己目标的十分之一都没还完成

translation.en: My wife's already demanding I come home.
translation.zh: 我妻子已经在强烈要求我回家去了

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's just the port is… It's overflowing with desperate people.
translation.zh: 对不起 只是港口实在是…挤满了绝望的人们

translation.en: You're not the only person who cares.
translation.zh: 又不是只有你一个人在焦虑

translation.en: But this isn't a mob operation.
translation.zh: 可这不是一场犯罪活动

translation.en: We have to concentrate our resources.
translation.zh: 我们必须集中有限的资源才行

translation.en: You mean my money.
translation.zh: 你是说我的钱

translation.en: [Varian] Yes, your money.
translation.zh: 对 你的钱

translation.en: My time.
translation.zh: 我的时间

translation.en: Lena's time.
translation.zh: 莉娜的时间

translation.en: Look, if we don't concentrate on who we've set out to rescue,
translation.zh: 听着 如果我们不把精力集中在要我们救援的这张名单上

translation.en: we're never gonna get anything done.
translation.zh: 我们就什么都办不成了

translation.en: [in German] You know how he looks?
translation.zh: 你知道他长什么样吗？

translation.en: Lionel?
translation.zh: 利昂内尔？

translation.en: Lionel!
translation.zh: 利昂内尔！

translation.en: [in English] A woman sent us.
translation.zh: 一个女人让我们来的

translation.en: Mary Jayne Gold.
translation.zh: 玛丽·珍·戈尔德？

translation.en: She only paid for two.
translation.zh: 她只出了两个人的钱

translation.en: [Lionel in French] Listen up!
translation.zh: 仔细听好

translation.en: Take the dinghy and hurry over to the stern side of the boat.
translation.zh: 坐上这艘小船 赶到船尾那边去

translation.en: Our men will tell you where to hide. Understood?
translation.zh: 我们的人会告诉你们要躲在哪里 明白吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: [Lionel] Documented passengers board when the ship comes into port.
translation.zh: 有证件的乘客会等船进港后再登船

translation.en: You'll board now, before the cargo.
translation.zh: 你们现在就得登船 在装货之前

translation.en: Stay in the hold till the anchor is raised. Okay?
translation.zh: 在起锚之前 要躲在货舱里 明白吗？

translation.en: [in German] Isn't he coming?
translation.zh: 他不跟我们一起来？

translation.en: [in German] Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: [woman] Oh no!
translation.zh: 糟糕！

translation.en: No! No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不要啊！

translation.en: No, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 不要啊！

translation.en: [man in French] Police. [woman in English] Don't stop.
translation.zh: -警察-别停下来啊

translation.en: [man in German] Ursula, we need to jump! Take off your coat.
translation.zh: 娥苏拉 我们必须跳了！ 把外套脱掉

translation.en: [man in German] You'll be too heavy.
translation.zh: 不然会太重的

translation.en: -[Ursula] Can he swim? -Quick!
translation.zh: 他会游泳吗？ 快！

translation.en: Ursula!
translation.zh: 娥苏拉！

translation.en: Ursula!
translation.zh: 娥苏拉！

translation.en: [Ursula] Albert!
translation.zh: 阿尔伯特！

translation.en: [Albert] Can you see him?
translation.zh: 你能看到他吗？

translation.en: -No, I can't find him! -I'll go back down. Stay here!
translation.zh: -不 我找不着他！-我下去看看 待在这儿！

translation.en: [Ursula] Albert!
translation.zh: 阿尔伯特？

translation.en: [Ursula] Albert!
translation.zh: 阿尔伯特！

translation.en: Did you try to swim to America?
translation.zh: 你打算游泳去美国啊？

translation.en: Easier than getting an exit visa.
translation.zh: 那也比拿到出境签证容易

translation.en: At least I survived.
translation.zh: 至少我活下来了

translation.en: An old man drowned trying.
translation.zh: 有个老爷爷逃的时候淹死了

translation.en: Exit stamps, entry papers,
translation.zh: 出境章、入境证件

translation.en: transit visas…
translation.zh: 过境签证…

translation.en: The Nazis took inspiration from Kafka.
translation.zh: 纳粹是收到了卡夫卡的启发

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: An American tried to help us, but…
translation.zh: 一个美国人想要帮助我们 但…

translation.en: Americans?
translation.zh: 美国人？

translation.en: Forget it.
translation.zh: 别指望了

translation.en: We have to help ourselves.
translation.zh: 我们只能自救

translation.en: [in English] Mr. Benjamin, I assure you that we are gonna get you out of here.
translation.zh: 本雅明先生 我向您保证我们会带你离开这里的

translation.en: There was no way to anticipate what happened…
translation.zh: 谁也无法预料会发生这种事…

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: -[Varian] Police round-up on the MS Rex. -[Mary Jayne] What?
translation.zh: -今早警方包围了MS雷克斯号-什么？

translation.en: Caught dozens of refugees trying to stow away.
translation.zh: 逮到了十几个想利用货舱偷渡的难民

translation.en: The boat's been impounded.
translation.zh: 船已经被扣押了

translation.en: Can you take the dog, please?
translation.zh: 能帮我抱一下狗吗？

translation.en: -Sorry, I have to go. -Mary Jayne.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我必须得去-玛丽·珍

translation.en: [in German] I'll die in this godforsaken country.
translation.zh: 我要死在这个被神抛弃的国家了

translation.en: -[Mary Jayne in French] Is this enough? -No.
translation.zh: 够了吗？ 不

translation.en: [man] Let's go, ladies.
translation.zh: 走吧 女士们

translation.en: -[in German] What's going on? -Just keep walking.
translation.zh: 怎么回事？ 继续走就行

translation.en: How can we help ourselves?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么自救？

translation.en: Tell me.
translation.zh: 告诉我

translation.en: [in English] You set us up?
translation.zh: 是你陷害我们？

translation.en: No. I swear to you, I didn't. I thought it would work. I bailed you out.
translation.zh: 不 我向你发誓 我没有我以为能成功的 我把你们保释了

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 真是太对不起了

translation.en: Uh, your brother should be here too.
translation.zh: 你弟弟应该也在这里

translation.en: [in German] Did you see my brother?
translation.zh: 你们见过我弟弟吗？

translation.en: [in English] Did you see my brother? He's… He's this tall, blue eyes.
translation.zh: 你们见过我弟弟吗？他有这么高 蓝眼睛

translation.en: Oh yeah. I think they took him aside as we were coming out.
translation.zh: 见过 我们出来的时候他们好像把他拉走了

translation.en: -[Ursula] He's still inside? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他还在里面？-嗯

translation.en: [in German] My brother's still inside. Please, you have to help us.
translation.zh: 我弟弟还在里面 求你了 帮帮我们吧

translation.en: I've found an unguarded path over the mountains.
translation.zh: 我在山上找到一条无人看守的小路

translation.en: Over the Pyrenees? On foot? That's impossible.
translation.zh: 在比利牛斯山上？徒步？不可能…

translation.en: I'm leaving now. Come if you want.
translation.zh: 我现在就要走 如果你愿意就跟我来

translation.en: [in English] Please let me make it up to you.
translation.zh: 拜托了 请让我补偿你

translation.en: -She found a pass into Spain. -[Mary Jayne] What?
translation.zh: 她找到了一条去西班牙的山路 什么？

translation.en: [in German] Who's that?
translation.zh: 她是谁啊？

translation.en: [in English] You can trust me. Please. I wanna help.
translation.zh: 你能相信我的 拜托了 我很想帮忙

translation.en: [in English] The path starts outside Banyuls-sur-Mer.
translation.zh: 那条路从这里开始就在滨海巴纽尔斯边上

translation.en: [in German] Albert, I…
translation.zh: 阿尔伯特 我不能…

translation.en: -[in English] I can't leave Albert. -I'll wait for him.
translation.zh: -我不能留下阿尔伯特-那我在这里等他

translation.en: -You'd do that? -Here… one second.
translation.zh: -你愿意这么做？-这样 等一下

translation.en: [in German] Can we really trust her?
translation.zh: 我们真能信任她吗？

translation.en: [in English] Show me. I'll make sure he finds you.
translation.zh: 来 再给我看一下地图我会确保他能找到你的 行吗？

translation.en: We can't wait for him.
translation.zh: 我们可没办法等他

translation.en: Border guards start patrolling at sunrise. They shoot to kill.
translation.zh: 边防军在日出时就会开始巡逻他们见人就射杀

translation.en: Then I will make sure that he is right behind you, I promise.
translation.zh: 那我一定会确保他紧跟在你们后面 我保证

translation.en: Okay, just outside Banyuls-sur-Mer, there is a stone house.
translation.zh: 好 就在滨海巴纽尔边上有一栋石头屋

translation.en: You want to turn right. Okay? And then you see the vineyards…
translation.zh: 你要右转 明白吗？然后你会见到一个酒庄…

translation.en: Hirschman. Sir.
translation.zh: 赫希曼 长官

translation.en: [in French] An old German name.
translation.zh: 古德语名字

translation.en: -[in English] Difficult. -Hm.
translation.zh: 很难拼

translation.en: [in French] Maybe. It's spelled differently in each of your passports.
translation.zh: 或许是因为你每本护照上的拼写都不一样

translation.en: So, which is the real one?
translation.zh: 那么 到底哪个才是真的？

translation.en: Or are they all fake?
translation.zh: 还是说全都是假的？

translation.en: [in English] Uh, you fought at Hannut?
translation.zh: 您在寒尼打过仗？

translation.en: [in French] You fought at Hannut?
translation.zh: 您参加过寒尼的战斗？

translation.en: Ah, yes.
translation.zh: 啊 是的

translation.en: I still don't understand how it all went south so quickly.
translation.zh: 我到现在也想不明白情况怎么会这样急转直下

translation.en: I served…
translation.zh: 我参过军

translation.en: in the French immigrant infantry division,
translation.zh: 法国移民步兵师…

translation.en: east of Paris.
translation.zh: 在法国东部

translation.en: [in English] It's where my French passport comes from.
translation.zh: 我的法国护照就是这么来的

translation.en: General Georges gave it to me himself.
translation.zh: 乔治将军亲自给我的

translation.en: I used this one
translation.zh: 我就是用它

translation.en: to fight for the republicans in Spain.
translation.zh: 去西班牙为共和军作战的

translation.en: This one here got me into Italy to study economics
translation.zh: 这一本帮助我去意大利读了经济学

translation.en: until the fascists kicked me out.
translation.zh: 直到法西斯们把我赶走

translation.en: And this one…
translation.zh: 而这一本…

translation.en: This one got me out of Germany in '33.
translation.zh: 33年时帮助我逃出了德国

translation.en: [in French] So which is your real identity?
translation.zh: 那么 你的真实身份是什么？

translation.en: [in English] If you ask the Nazis? None.
translation.zh: 如果你问纳粹的话 没有

translation.en: They don't think that I deserve an identity.
translation.zh: 他们认为我不配有身份

translation.en: [in French] An American woman paid your bail.
translation.zh: 一个美国女人支付了你的保释金

translation.en: I kept you for falsifying documents, but…
translation.zh: 我因为伪造文件扣下了你

translation.en: I see nothing false about you.
translation.zh: 但我看得出 你身上没有一点假

translation.en: [Mary Jayne] Sir, please…
translation.zh: 长官 求您了…

translation.en: [in English] You told me he'd be out two hours ago,
translation.zh: 您两小时前就跟我说他快出来了

translation.en: and now I've been waiting here, and I…
translation.zh: 我在这里一直等到现在 可…

translation.en: Excuse me, are you Albert Hirschman?
translation.zh: 不好意思你是阿尔伯特·赫希曼吗？

translation.en: -I'm Mary Jayne-- -I know. The American.
translation.zh: 我叫玛丽·珍… 我知道 那个美国人

translation.en: -Where's my sister? -Um…
translation.zh: 我姐姐在哪里？

translation.en: There's a lot that I have to explain to you,
translation.zh: 我有太多的事需要跟你解释

translation.en: but… we are so late.
translation.zh: 可是… 我们已经太晚了

translation.en: You're never gonna make it. Um…
translation.zh: 你肯定赶不上了

translation.en: Wh--
translation.zh: 要不…

translation.en: I… I could drive you there. I'll drive you there.
translation.zh: 我可以开车送你过去 我开车送你吧

translation.en: You don't have somewhere else you need to be?
translation.zh: 你不需要去什么别的地方吗？

translation.en: How old are you?
translation.zh: 你多大了啊？

translation.en: Twenty-five.
How old are you?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: That's a very rude question.
translation.zh: 这个问题很没礼貌

translation.en: And what do you do?
translation.zh: 你是做什么的？

translation.en: Do?
translation.zh: 做什么？

translation.en: Professionally.
translation.zh: 什么职业？

translation.en: -I trained as an economist. -Oh.
translation.zh: 我受过经济学家的训练

translation.en: But, uh, well, I've been running from the Nazis for so long,
translation.zh: 但为了躲避纳粹 我已经逃了太久

translation.en: at this point, I guess… I'm a professional refugee.
translation.zh: 到了现在 我想… 我已经是一名职业难民了

translation.en: And a Jew.
translation.zh: 也是一名犹太人

translation.en: Yeah. You know, being Jewish never really meant anything to me.
translation.zh: 是啊 你知道吗过去犹太人的身份对我并无任何意义

translation.en: Now it's the most important thing about me.
translation.zh: 可现在却成了我身上最重要的一点

translation.en: What do you do?
translation.zh: 那你是做什么的？

translation.en: I… do what I can.
translation.zh: 我…做我能做的吧

translation.en: I have a car.
translation.zh: 我有辆车

translation.en: -A Mercedes, no less. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 而且还是一辆奔驰

translation.en: People think there's nothing they can do to help, so they do nothing.
translation.zh: 人们总觉得自己做什么也帮不上忙所以他们就干脆什么都不做

translation.en: Most people don't expect rich, beautiful American girls to do anything.
translation.zh: 大部分人都不指望有钱又漂亮的美国女孩能做任何事

translation.en: I'm missing my plane to Chicago tonight to drive you to the border of Spain.
translation.zh: 知道吗 为了开车送你去西班牙边境我要错过今晚去芝加哥的航班了

translation.en: What's in Chicago?
translation.zh: 去芝加哥干嘛？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: People's assumptions about you can be useful if you know how to use them.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 如果你懂怎么利用的话人们对你的臆断还是挺有用的

translation.en: Oh God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[Albert] Just play the American girl. -Yeah, what are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 继续演你的美国女孩就行 好啊 那你怎么办？

translation.en: -[in French] Hello. Papers, please. -Oh. Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 你好 请出示证件 好 长官 没问题

translation.en: Excuse me, sir. Um…
translation.zh: 不好意思 长官

translation.en: [in English] We're in a hurry.
translation.zh: 我们有点急

translation.en: -[in French] Hurry… Hurry? -Ah. Why are you in a hurry?
translation.zh: 着…着急？ 你们为什么着急？

translation.en: [in English] We just had oysters.
translation.zh: 我们刚吃完生蚝

translation.en: [officer in French] Ah, oysters.
translation.zh: 哦 生蚝啊

translation.en: All good.
translation.zh: 没问题了

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢-不客气

translation.en: Let them pass!
translation.zh: 放他们过去！

translation.en: [in English] Paul. Any news?
translation.zh: 保罗 有消息吗？

translation.en: Nothing yet.
translation.zh: 还没有

translation.en: Your wife must have a lot to say. Never misses a day.
translation.zh: 您妻子一定有很多话要说吧她一天都没停过

translation.en: You married, Paul?
translation.zh: 你结婚了吗 保罗？

translation.en: Not yet, sir. Just me and Petit. And our mother back home in Ouidah.
translation.zh: 还没有 先生 我们家只有我和佩蒂特还有我们住在维达老家的母亲

translation.en: -Where is that? -West Africa, Mr. Fry.
translation.zh: -那是哪儿？-非洲西部 弗莱先生

translation.en: Some say French Dahomey. But it used to be the Kingdom of Dahomey.
translation.zh: 有人叫那里法属达荷美但以前叫达荷美王国

translation.en: She want you home?
translation.zh: 她想让你回家吗？

translation.en: -She's just glad we are out of the army. -I am saving all my money to go home.
translation.zh: -她很高兴我们不参军了-我把所有钱都存了下来准备回家去

translation.en: [chuckles] He wants to go back.
translation.zh: 我很想回家去

translation.en: But I want to finish my studies. I have big plans.
translation.zh: 但我想完成学业 我有好多大计划

translation.en: Where's this from? There's no postage on this.
translation.zh: 这封是从哪里来的？上面没有邮票

translation.en: A man hand-delivered it this morning. He said he was an old friend.
translation.zh: 今早有个男人亲自送来的他说他是一位老朋友

translation.en: Uh, do you have a map of the local area?
translation.zh: 你有本地的地图吗？

translation.en: Yes. Yes, of course.
translation.zh: 有 当然了

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 给

translation.en: [in French] Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [in English] So, I think they can't be that far away
translation.zh: 我觉得她们应该没走太远

translation.en: because you've already cut the distance in half. You see?
translation.zh: 因为你已经把距离减半了 看到没？

translation.en: Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: Whoever's waiting for you in Chicago will be very disappointed tomorrow.
translation.zh: 在芝加哥等你的那个人明天一定会非常失望的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: [Varian] Thomas.
translation.zh: 托马斯

translation.en: Welcome to the Villa Air-Bel.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到艾尔贝尔庄园

translation.en: Whose house is this?
translation.zh: 这是谁的房子啊？

translation.en: [chuckles] It belongs to a distant relative.
translation.zh: 我一位远房亲戚的

translation.en: [Varian] And you're living here?
translation.zh: 你一直住在这里？

translation.en: [Thomas] I just got here.
translation.zh: 我才刚到

translation.en: I'm still trying to get the electricity turned on.
translation.zh: 我还在想办法怎么通电呢

translation.en: I sent a letter to your home in New Jersey.
translation.zh: 我给你在新泽西的家寄了封信

translation.en: Your wife wrote back.
translation.zh: 你老婆回信了

translation.en: Told me you're saving the European brain trust from the Nazis.
translation.zh: 跟我说你正在从纳粹手中拯救欧洲的智囊

translation.en: How's that going?
translation.zh: 还顺利吗？

translation.en: It's going very well. Thank you.
translation.zh: 进行得很顺利 谢谢你

translation.en: You're still a terrible liar.
translation.zh: 你还是这么不会撒谎

translation.en: -[Varian] I have to get back to work. -Right now?
translation.zh: -我得回去工作了-现在？

translation.en: I'm doing something truly important here, maybe for the first time in my life.
translation.zh: 我正在做一件非常重要的事或许是我人生中的头一回

translation.en: -[Thomas] I could help you. -And then what?
translation.zh: 我可以帮你的 然后呢？再人间蒸发五年？

translation.en: Disappear again for five years?
translation.zh: 然后呢？再人间蒸发五年？

translation.en: I thought you'd been captured, Thomas.
translation.zh: 我还以为你被捕了 托马斯

translation.en: Or worse.
translation.zh: 甚至更糟

translation.en: Thomas.
translation.zh: 托马斯

translation.en: I can't let you distract me.
translation.zh: 我可不能被你分心

translation.en: Never.
translation.zh: 不会的

translation.en: [in German] Just a few steps to the Spanish border.
translation.zh: 还有几步就到西班牙边境了

translation.en: -Is that good? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -还好吗？-嗯

translation.en: Say goodbye to France.
translation.zh: 跟法国说再见吧

translation.en: [man in English] Stop!
translation.zh: 站住

translation.en: [in German] Run!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: [man in French] Stop immediately!
translation.zh: 不许动！

translation.en: Papers, please, everyone!
translation.zh: 证件 所有人！

translation.en: The village ahead is Spanish territory!
translation.zh: 前面的村庄是西班牙领土！

translation.en: You cannot approach the border without a French exit stamp.
translation.zh: 没有法国的出境章你们就不能前往国境

translation.en: [in German] What the hell do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: 你们是谁？你们这是在搞什么东西？

translation.en: Why did you abandon your posts?
translation.zh: 为什么擅离岗位？

translation.en: Huh? Unmanned tracts of the Spanish border
translation.zh: 西班牙边境的无人区

translation.en: are under direct control of the Geheime Staatspolizei.
translation.zh: 是受德国秘密警察直接管辖之地

translation.en: -[in French] What's that? -Gestapo.
translation.zh: -“德国秘密警察”？那是什…-盖世太保

translation.en: [in German] Your presence is a violation of the Compiègne Armistice
translation.zh: 你们在这里出现 直接违反了德法政府之间的贡比涅停战协定

translation.en: between our two governments.
translation.zh: 直接违反了德法政府之间的贡比涅停战协定

translation.en: This is the new France, officers.
translation.zh: 这里是新法国 警官们

translation.en: Performing duties beyond the limits of your jurisdiction
translation.zh: 超出职权范围进行执法

translation.en: is punishable by law. Do you understand that?
translation.zh: 是会收到法律制裁的 你们明白吗？

translation.en: -[in French] Yes. -[in German] Keep it straight.
translation.zh: -明白-给我记住了

translation.en: Now run along back to your desks.
translation.zh: 现在给我赶紧跑回你们的桌前去

translation.en: Go! Now! Run!
translation.zh: 快！现在！跑去！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Albert] From Barcelona, we take the bus to Lisbon?
translation.zh: 就是说 我们从巴塞罗那再坐巴士去里斯本 对吧？

translation.en: [Ursula] Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Come.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: -I can't do it. -[Ursula] What?
translation.zh: -我做不到-什么？

translation.en: [woman] I'm going back.
translation.zh: 我要回去

translation.en: -No. -[woman] I'm going.
translation.zh: -不要-我要去

translation.en: Not you too?
translation.zh: 你不会也要去吧？

translation.en: -Listen to me. -I knew it.
translation.zh: -听我说-我就知道

translation.en: There are so many people now in Marseille just waiting to get out.
translation.zh: 此时此刻 在马赛有太多的人在等待着逃出去的机会

translation.en: We know how to get them out.
translation.zh: 而我们知道如何救他们出来

translation.en: We observe Shabbat once with that old man and now you're Moses?
translation.zh: 我们跟那个老头过了个安息日你现在就成了摩西？

translation.en: Ursula…
translation.zh: 娥苏拉…

translation.en: [Ursula] You'll both end up in a camp. Or dead.
translation.zh: 你们俩会被关进集中营的 甚至死掉

translation.en: -[horn honks] -Ursula…
translation.zh: 娥苏拉…

translation.en: You promised you'd stay with me.
translation.zh: 你答应过要跟我待在一起的

translation.en: [man] Señores, nos vamos.
translation.zh: 小姐 要开车了

translation.en: Ursula.
translation.zh: 娥苏拉

translation.en: Please understand.
translation.zh: 请你理解

translation.en: I'll catch up with you in Lisbon. Do you hear?
translation.zh: 我会在里斯本跟你再见的 听到没？

translation.en: Send word of your whereabouts to the Splendide. Did you hear me?
translation.zh: 把你的行踪寄到斯普莱迪德去 听到了吗？

translation.en: Send word of where you are to the Splendide!
translation.zh: 把你的行踪寄到斯普莱迪德去！

translation.en: [reporter in French] In Marseille, authorities declared that due to gross mismanagement, creating an illegal immigration crisis,
translation.zh: 在马赛 当局已经宣布由于管理上的重大失误

translation.en: a series of arrests, and an unmanageable crisis for the police,
translation.zh: 一连串的抓捕和警方无法应对的危机

translation.en: no passenger ships bound for points west will dock in Marseille or in France…
translation.zh: 任何向西行驶的客船都不会在马赛 -或是法国沿岸的任何地方停靠…-可恶

translation.en: [in English] Damn it.
translation.zh: -或是法国沿岸的任何地方停靠…-可恶

translation.en: …until further notice.
translation.zh: 等待进一步的命令

translation.en: In fact, all French ports will remain closed to all passenger ships
translation.zh: 事实上 所有法国港口将停止向所有客船开放

translation.en: until the threat of…
translation.zh: 直到解除威胁…

translation.en: -[in English] Wait. Can they do that? -They just did it.
translation.zh: -等等 关闭港口？他们能干这种事？-他们已经这么干了

translation.en: [reporter] Vichy has instructed the police
translation.zh: 维希政府已指示国家警察

translation.en: to begin enforcement of Article 19 of the Franco-German armistice.
translation.zh: 开始执行法德停战协议第19条

translation.en: What's Article 19?
translation.zh: 第19条是什么？

translation.en: All refugees on French soil must be surrendered on demand.
translation.zh: 法国领土上的所有难民在指令下统统得被交出去

translation.en: -To whom? -The German Reich.
translation.zh: -交给谁？-德意志帝国

translation.en: You said they weren't gonna crack down.
translation.zh: 你说他们不会这样严抓严打的

translation.en: I was wrong.
translation.zh: 我错了

translation.en: Wait. They can't actually deport people, can they?
translation.zh: 等等 他们总不能把人都驱逐出境吧？

translation.en: -They can make it impossible to get out-- -It's already impossible.
translation.zh: 最多也就让人无法出境… 现在已经无法出境了

translation.en: But send them back? Now?
translation.zh: 可是把他们送回去？现在？

translation.en: -[knocking] -[Varian] Come in!
translation.zh: 请进！

translation.en: Can I help you?
translation.zh: 有什么事吗？

translation.en: -[Albert] I'm looking for Miss Gold. -[Mary Jayne] What are you doing here?
translation.zh: -我是来找戈尔德小姐的-你来这里做什么？

translation.en: This is Lisa Fittko.
translation.zh: 这位是丽莎·菲特科

translation.en: -She found a safe route into Spain. -[Mary Jayne] It worked?
translation.zh: 她找到了一条安全入境西班牙的山路 -成功了？-我们昨晚翻过去了

translation.en: We went over last night
translation.zh: -成功了？-我们昨晚翻过去了

translation.en: with five people who are now on their way to safety in Lisbon.
translation.zh: 此刻有五个人正在安全地前往里斯本的路上

translation.en: Commissaire Frot!
translation.zh: 弗罗警长！

translation.en: So glad you could join me.
translation.zh: 您能来真是太好了

translation.en: I just want to be absolutely sure that you understand the Article 19.
translation.zh: 我只是想百分百确定您充分理解第19条

translation.en: Yes, I read your cable.
translation.zh: 嗯 我已经读过您的电报了

translation.en: Uh, all undesirables are to be surrendered upon demand to the local police.
translation.zh: 如果当地警察提出要求所有不良分子都必须被交出

translation.en: Rosé?
translation.zh: 桃红酒？

translation.en: Marseille is crawling with refugees from all over Europe.
translation.zh: 马赛到处都挤满了来自全欧洲的难民

translation.en: Um, I am the chief of police, so it is my job to clean up the city.
translation.zh: 我身为警察局长清理这座城市是我的职责

translation.en: You are the American consul, Mr. Patterson.
translation.zh: 您是美国领事 帕特森先生

translation.en: So it is your job to make sure that no American people make trouble for me.
translation.zh: 所以您的职责是确保没有任何美国人会给我添麻烦

translation.en: [in French] Of course.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: [in English] Then what about the American Emergency Rescue Committee?
translation.zh: 那么 这个美国紧急救援委员会又是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Frot] Despite my instructions, you issued the visa they requested
translation.zh: 尽管我已经下令了 您还是按他们的请求为德国作家瓦尔特·本雅明发了签证

translation.en: for German writer Walter Benjamin.
translation.zh: 您还是按他们的请求为德国作家瓦尔特·本雅明发了签证

translation.en: You said dangerous writers.
translation.zh: 您说的是“危险的作家”

translation.en: You never mentioned Walter Benjamin explicitly.
translation.zh: 您从未具体提过瓦尔特·本雅明的名字啊

translation.en: He writes about nonsense. How could he be dangerous?
translation.zh: 他写的都是些乱七八糟的东西怎么可能危险呢？

translation.en: He's on the Nazi blacklist.
translation.zh: 他在纳粹的黑名单上

translation.en: So if this man leaves Marseille on my watch,
translation.zh: 所以 要是这个人在我的管制下离开马赛

translation.en: I will hold you accountable.
translation.zh: 我一定会追究您的责任

translation.en: Well, lucky for both of us, his boat got impounded a few days ago,
translation.zh: 算我们俩走运他要坐的船几天前被扣押了

translation.en: so he's probably still shacked up at the Splendide.
translation.zh: 所以他很可能还被困在斯普莱迪德呢

translation.en: Benjamin is at the Hotel Splendide?
translation.zh: 沃尔特·本雅明住在斯普莱迪德酒店里？

translation.en: Last I heard, they all were. Benjamin, Ernst, Breton.
translation.zh: 没走的话 他们都在啊本雅明、恩斯特、布勒东

translation.en: If we cross the border before the guards show up at daybreak,
translation.zh: 要是我们赶在天亮守卫上岗之前趁着夜色穿越国境

translation.en: I could take… four people at a time, twice a week.
translation.zh: 我一次能… 带四个人走 一周两次

translation.en: That's over 100 by Christmas.
translation.zh: 这样 圣诞节前就能走超过一百人

translation.en: And you don't need French exit stamps?
translation.zh: 你们确定不需要法国的出境章吗？

translation.en: If they do, we'll just buy forgeries. That's easy.
translation.zh: 如果需要的话 我们买伪造的就行这是最简单的部分

translation.en: I need to keep this squeaky clean.
translation.zh: 我必须确保行动不受非议才行

translation.en: Varian, this is our chance. Think about the number of people we can--
translation.zh: 瓦里安 这是我们的机会想想我们能救多少人…

translation.en: What if the French police come after me and shut this down?
translation.zh: 要是法国警察找上我怎么办？逼我们解散委员会？

translation.en: [Albert] You don't have to know about it.
translation.zh: 这些事根本不用你知道

translation.en: I'll deal with the black market. You remain clean.
translation.zh: 黑市交给我来处理保证查不到你头上

translation.en: -[Varian] Forgeries can't be cheap. -No.
translation.zh: -伪造文件可不便宜-世上无便宜之事

translation.en: I'll take care of it.
translation.zh: 有我在 都交给我就行

translation.en: -We're also talking about train tickets. -[Mary Jayne] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -我们还得算上火车票-嗯哼

translation.en: -Hotels. Meals. -[Mary Jayne] I have the money.
translation.zh: -旅店、餐点-我有钱

translation.en: No problem.
translation.zh: 没问题的

translation.en: -Okay. -[Albert] Okay!
translation.zh: -好吧-好嘞！

translation.en: Okay! All right, well, that is settled, then.
translation.zh: 好嘞！很好 那就这么定了

translation.en: Varian, you remain the face of the operation.
translation.zh: 瓦里安 你继续做我们行动的代言人

translation.en: Lisa, you are the muscle.
translation.zh: 丽莎 你是护送保镖

translation.en: -Albert's definitely the criminal. -Oh no! [chuckles]
translation.zh: -阿尔伯特绝对是犯罪分子-才不是！

translation.en: Okay, then what are you?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你是什么？

translation.en: Oh, I'm just the bank.
translation.zh: 噢 我只是银行而已

translation.en: Give yourself more credit.
translation.zh: 别妄自菲薄呀

translation.en: -[knock on door] -[Varian] Come in.
translation.zh: 请进

translation.en: And who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: Paul. Kandjo.
translation.zh: 保罗 姓坎乔

translation.en: -Oh, he's the brains. -[Paul] Uh, telegram for Mary Jayne.
translation.zh: 噢 他是我们的智囊 给玛丽·珍的电报

translation.en: [Lisa] We need a budget.
translation.zh: 我们需要做个预算

translation.en: How much per person?
translation.zh: 每个人要多少钱？

translation.en: I'm sure people will be happy to share rooms.
translation.zh: 我相信没人会介意跟别人共用房间的

translation.en: [Varian] How easy is the hike?
translation.zh: 徒步爬山容易吗？

translation.en: [Varian] Right, Mary Jayne?
translation.zh: 一旦你准备好就行 对吗 玛丽·珍？

translation.en: Mary Jayne, everything okay?
translation.zh: 玛丽·珍 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: Let's get back to work.
translation.zh: 我们开始行动吧
